text: Cheaper by the Dozen is a 2003 American family comedy movie directed by Shawn Levy. It stars Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt. It is a remake of the 1950 movie of the same name. The movie was released on December 25, 2003, by 20th Century Fox and made $190.2 million worldwide. A sequel, Cheaper by the Dozen 2, was released in the United States on December 21, 2005. Both movies were inspired by the real life Gilbreth family and the semi-autobiographical account of their lives as written in Cheaper by the Dozen by Frank Bunker Gilbreth Jr. and his sister Ernestine Gilbreth Carey. ==References== Category:2003 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Shawn Levy Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago
title: Cheaper by the Dozen (2003 movie)
